snippet: The Los Angeles County Museum of Art has proposed combining with the Museum of Contemporary Art, which has struggled with precarious finances.
abstract: Los Angeles County Museum of Art is proposing merger with Museum of Contemporary Art in LA, which has been battered with defections of board members, criticism of its direction and precarious finances.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles County Museum of Art has proposed combining with the Museum of Contemporary Art, which has struggled with precarious finances.

headline.seo: Los Angeles County Art Museum Urges Merger With Museum of Contemporary Art
headline.main: New Proposal to Merge Art Museums in Los Angeles
headline.print_headline: New Proposal To Merge Art Museums In Los Angeles
